message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_SUPPLIERTYPE_NOT_KNOWN
message.locale: Supplier link type must be either case participant role or user.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_STATUS_NOT_SCHEDULED
message.locale: The hearing status must be scheduled before an interpreter can be added.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_CASEUSERROLE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The user is already an interpreter for the hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_PARTICIPANTROLE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: This person is already an interpreter for the hearing".

message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_COMMENTS_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The comments area for outlining details of the modify must be provided.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_PARTICIPATED_CODE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: A value for Attendance must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_NAME_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: A value for Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_CASE_CANCELED
message.locale: Interpreter details cannot be modified for a canceled hearing.
Interpreter details cannot be modified for a cancelled hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_CANNOT_MODIFY_PARTICIPATED_CODE
message.locale: The Attendance can only be modified for a completed or adjourned hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_INTERPRETER_FV_EXISTING_AND_CREATE
message.locale: Cannot select both an existing person and create a new participant.
